评论详情: I was going to wear this for maternity photos but chose a different dress. I didn’t like how it looked on me being 32 weeks pregnant. I wish it was a little more flowy. Maybe if I went up a size but I don’t think the top would have fit right then.

I have ordered several difffernt colors love the dress exactly like the FP brand , but I ordered the black twice got a completely different dress  very disappointed …..would like to get  it in black  if they could send right dress

Very cute, flowy dress. Lightweight and flattering. The fit was great for a wider hips. There is a decent amount of stretch under the breast area. The cream color is a bit see through if using dark undergarments. Would purchase again!

Bought this for my baby shower and I am not disappointed! I sized up to make sure the waistband wasn’t too tight on top of my bump and it was definitely the right choice. I’ll need a bit of tape for my chest as I’m not the most privileged but otherwise it’s perfect! Lightweight, floor length (I’m 5’2), and perfect for this summer after pregnancy as well.

I was soooo excited for this dress but I can’t tell you enough about how see through it is. Make sure you have nude underwear and bras! It’s going to have to work because I’m on a time crunch but wish there was a liner underneath

This dress is beautiful. Everything is stretchy but also flowy at the same time. Even the thread connecting the panels is elastic. I truly love it but my bust is too large. I don’t have a bra that can be warn with it. And I don’t want to wear a tank top. So it’s got to go bad sadly. If you are small chested and can get away with a deep plunge, get this dress!!!!! It’s gorgeous

评论概述: Cute last minute outfit for family photos…..
评论详情: Decently cute.. and actually cuter on than I expected however it totally looks like a maternity dress. It made me look like I was trying to hide a baby bump or something… idk. I returned for that reason. I would have gotten an XS if they had it and maybe it would have fit better.
I wore this dress to go to the courthouse and I loved it! It’s so light weight and flattering!

I’m on the left. The dress turned out perfect with a bralette. I wanted a boho style dress for my brothers wedding. It’s not see through, but I did wear a body suit underneath, true to size, and roomy!
Love this maxi dress! Comfortable and easy to wear!
Wanted to love this dress so bad! It was so see through. I tried everything to make it work. No slip or shape wear could do anything. Don’t recommend.

评论概述: A dress every one should have in their closet!
评论详情: I absolutely love this dress- it isn’t heavy, it’s comfortable and breathable. It is a tad long on me. I’m 5’5 so just have to wear a little platform. I do not have to wear a bra with this either as it secures my girls and is comfortable on the skin. This dress is versatile as well. I think everyone should have this in their closet! I would love all the colors!
dress arrived torn from the v neck in the front and has a nasty smell!

It's an OK dup to the original dress but the skirt isn't quite wide enough and the fabric isn't great. It's sort of seersucker-y and therefore isn't flattering. This would be a great maternity dress. Cause it really highlights any sort of belly.

I ended up returning this as it seemed a little cheap. The material was very easily wrinkled and the cut hit a little low. I thought it looked like a similar dress I had from free people, but ultimately the quality did not compare. The cut of the dress is pretty low, which I wasn't a huge fan of. I bought to wear while pregnant and did feel like the fit was great. I just ordered my normal size. Had the material been better I would have kept, but ultimately wasn't worth it for me.
It wasn’t flattering on me

Free people dupe! I ordered this for our family pictures and it exceeded my expectations! So comfortable, flattering and photographed so well! Made me feel confident and beautiful! Highly recommend! Comes in multiple colors but this color worked for our color scheme! Not too hot, not see through. Fits true to size!
Took our maternity pics in the brown one! I got a xs I think and it fit perfect so it definitely runs big! Normally would’ve been a medium in this pic.
beautiful free people dupe. soft material, great style. great price. would buy again if I needed another color.
As soon as I got it, I tried it on, they got right back on Amazon and ordered it in another color.
VERY NICE DRESS!
This dress is beautiful and true to size and for being 5’2 it was a good length!
love this dress!
Se ve súper elegante

I was 8 months pregnant & wore this to my baby shower! Besides the top being very loose & I’m a 36DD, the dress is beautiful I love the material and how long it is. But I don’t see me wearing it now that I’m 5 months postpartum, the top is still very loose. Would recommend sizing down.
The material is flattering and flows perfectly for pictures. Great quality for the price. I’m a busty girl but it held up well in that department.

i give 4 stars because.. i had washed and dried this dress on delicate and it ripped apart at the cleavage area not horribly but i was able to sew it with out being able to tell. its very comfortable and very showy but modest at the top just very long but over all fit is great i would recommend just be careful washing it
I absolutely adore this women’s dress. It is so lightweight & stunning. I have received so many compliments on this dress & I honestly want it in every color!

The dress is flattering in the low front and low back, but the fabric is cheaper looking in person than online. Fits nice, but fabric is thicker and just kinda looks like a rough material rather than a flowy dress

Wore this dress to a wedding on a farm, and couldn’t have been happier with it! The material is heavy enough to feel high quality, but light enough to move in a really pretty way when you’re dancing. It was flattering and super comfortable - I also received a ton of compliments on it! The cut is a little low in the back for a traditional bra, but sticky boobs worked perfectly. For size reference, I am 5’7” and weigh about 150, and a Small fit perfectly!

I was kind of very disappointed on how see-through this dress was, and it was not flowing at all. Very box looking wouldn’t order again. I was going to wear it for My newborn session had to return it in order a different dress
Very cute, true to size but see through

Great fit. True to size and very flattering. I didn’t love the “bat wing” sleeve and how it wasn’t attached at the back, but overall everyone loved this dress and very similar to the FP dress. Would recommend!

Great dress, very flattering! I bought this for my son’s newborn photos and it was perfect. Material is soft and thin. The lighter color was a little see through but if you wear neutral undergarments you should be fine.

I wore this dress for maternity photos! Works well with the bump. Only downside (this color) was a little see through so I had to plan accordingly for underwear and bra. Sticky bra is needed due to backless and deep V. If you are busty, this dress is very revealing.
Flowy and beautiful. Well made and washes well.

Amazing dress for maternity pics :) couldn’t have chosen a better one. The fabric is super soft, it fits well, looks elegant. I just haven’t washed it yet so can’t not say anything on this matter but overall I’m very glad with my purchase.

评论概述: not see through, flowy, super comfortable
评论详情: love love love, didn’t want to take it off

This is a great dupe of the FP lala maxi. The shape is so flattering and the fabric is so comfortable. I feel beautiful and confident in this dress! Much better quality than many other Amazon dresses I’ve tried.  I am 6’ tall and it doesn’t touch the ground but dot feel like it’s too short either.
I am currently 32wks pregnant, 5'5, 188lbs and I wear a D cup. This dress is amazing. I got a size medium and it fits perfect. I cannot wait to wear it for my maternity pictures 😊
Ordered the white for family photos. Ended up able to see through the white dress when the light hit it.

评论概述: would size down if you want the cut to be higher especially if you don’t have a big chest.
评论详情: the fabric is very comfortable and the stitching is not suffocating!! would buy again!
It was the wrong color. Also, didn't care for the material

did minor alterations to the back part of the sleeve, attaching it to the dress so it’s not flying all over. Now it’s more of a flutter. Super flattering fit and just revealing enough for a sassy yet classy look. I also had worn a camisole underneath for a more conservative look
Great quality fabric and beautiful color! I’m 34D, size10 jeans, and ordered a Medium.

评论概述: I will definitely buy in a different color.
评论详情: I love this dress. Makes me feel so confident and it’s very comfortable. Does run a little big

High quality material & really amazing fit! I’m extremely impressed!! PS: - I’m 5’4”, 117lbs wearing size XS (I tried on the small but it was way too large on me!) - I’m not wearing a bra yet ‘the girls’ feel supported & look good! (bra size 32B) - There’s no lining in this dark brown color but it’s not needed bc not see through (not sure about the other colors)
True to size. You can decide whether you want to show some cleavage or you can have coverage. Awesome fabric. I got the brown and it wasn’t see through at all. Will purchase more colors for sure!

I absolutely love this dress. You can dress up in it or you can look very casual in it. I used it as a dress for a maternity shoot and it was absolutely perfect. It will also be perfect -- Postpartum and anytime. It's extremely comfortable and the fit is wonderful. I'm usually pretty cheap so I wouldn't spend money on something like this, but I'm really glad that I did. Honestly, I am tempted to get it in more colors. If you're on the fence about it, just buy it, you won't regret it.

I wear a size 12 and I ordered this dress is a large.  I had to rewritten bc the top tier of this dress hit me funny around my hips making me look wide.  If it was above or below it would have been fine.
Looks like Free People! Love this

This dress was exactly what I needed it to be and more! I was looking for something flowy for beach photos that wouldn’t become see through and this was it! It fit perfectly! I would suggest using boob tape if you are larger chested. I luckily didn’t have any slips but we didn’t do a lot of big movements. 12/10 recommend.
Hides all the right places, the texture of the dress is like gauze and is very flattering, very flowy and comfortable
Perfect for maternity photos, baby shower, or any event. So comfy and light!!! Absolutely love this dress!!!
Return this item as it was way too big
Beautiful. My wife looked lovely and gorgeous in this dress

评论概述: Good quality, better for someone taller than 5’3
评论详情: Quality of this product was good however I am 5’3 and the proportions were off. I also did not like how the top fit on my bust. The dress is better suited for women with a smaller chest.

评论概述: Cute and comfortable, but a bit sheer.
评论详情: I think this dress is a great option for date nights. It's pretty and relatively comfortable so, if it wasn't so low cut in the front, I would wear it more often. I have a larger chest and, while the dress fits fine and I don't feel like I'm falling out of it, it does shows a lot of cleavage. If you have a smaller chest, you could probably get away with wearing this beyond date night. My only issue is that it is a little too sheer because it only has one layer of fabric. I have tan skin and wearing beige underwear clearly shows my panty lines under this. I opted to wear beige shapewear that covers my torso down to my thighs, and that worked fine.

I ordered the brown and was nervous because I was looking for a specific dark brown. Most “brown” clothes are not usually what is pictured, but this brown dress IS that dark brown! It is the perfect dark brown that I was looking for
Complete see through. Awkward fit

This dress runs super big. Especially if you weren’t blessed in the chest like me. For reference I would usually order a medium in dresses and a large in pants because I have thick thighs and a buttock. I ordered a small and it fits PERFECTLY. The top fits like a glove to where I don’t need a bra or those pastie things, while the bottom is still flowy. I’m 5’2, 165 pounds and the small doesn’t scrub the ground too much either.
Very comfortable. Washes up nice keeps shape.

评论概述: All seasonal dress with character and charm!
评论详情: Lovely most comfortable dress. You can dress it up or down but I love the hobo look and the material gives it so much character and charm. I'm 1401bs, 5'4'', 36 breast size, 29 inch waist and a size large fits well all over. Loving the mustard color too. The company should offer free shipping to lessen the price. Buy this dress it's a winner....

This is a great dress: good material, perfect neutral color, airy and boho for the summer, just low-cut enough. However, I initially ordered the recommended size (medium -- usually a safe bet), and it wasn't just a little too big, it was literally falling off of my shoulders. If you're iffy about sizing, go down. And if, unlike myself, you have been blessed with significant cleavage, you might be better of skipping it altogether, or be prepared to get some double-sided tape going because it's going to be dangerous without.
Third trimester, perfect for summer outings! Comfy!

评论概述: Free people look but diff material
评论详情: I like the dress and is definitely made well . I purchase a lot of free people clothing and the prices are so outrageously expensive and seem to have gone up even more lately! This is a free people replica I think , but I know the one from FP is probably cotton or a better ( not so hot ) material.. so this dress is polyester and quite heavy so I don’t think I will wear on hot days . I will say for a replica it’s pretty damm close so thumbs up for that ! I do recommend this dress but just know it’s a heavy Polly olly material.. would have given a 5 star  if the material was better so 4 star for me . Hope this review helps !

I love the color and style! This dress is so cute and so much less expensive than the free people one. The material is a little bit itchy and rough but overall not something I would return it for. Super flowy and pretty.
Beautiful color (lavender), fit, & MUCH lighterweight fabric than the FP style, but the back isn't as low as the front. I wanted a real sundress. Returned.
Love this dress! Great quality and fit perfect! In dresses I’m usually a small or medium. I got a small and it fit perfect. I got so many compliments! I am 5’ 4” for height reference
Seriously beautiful! I'm 5'2 and weigh 160lbs and purchased a size Large and it fit perfectly. If I wear heels, the length will be perfect; if I want to use sandals, I'll have to sew the bottom.
I absolutely love this dress but if you have boobs it's probably not going to work.

This dress was super pretty and lightweight but the lines on the dress fell on an awkward spot on my body. Maybe if I was taller, I am 5’4 and have larger hips and smaller waist, where the lines hit made me look boxy, wanted to really like it but sent it back.

I don't do a lot of reviews because I'm lazy but this dress deserves one. I got the lavender color and it is absolutely beautiful. Great quality and fit, sizing is perfect, and material is nice too. I have the FP one in a different color and it's literally the same. I'm 5'7 148lbs and I got a small. I am smaller chested so I don't know about sizing for bigger bra sizes though. Super impressed with this one!

Typically a size 16-18/XL-XXL based on material. Ordered this in an XL and it fit perfect for a flowy look. The material is opaque and breathable. I love the bell sleeve detail. Color is as pictured. The V neck is rather deep and can be a bit much if you’re chesty, like I am, but I used my hair to cover the area or you could use a cami.

This dress is beautiful.  It is comfortable, well made and looks so pretty on.  I got the beige color and it is nice.  The material of the dress is thick so even though the color is light it is not see through.  The sleeves and the neckline are a little elastic so even though it is a flowy dress the neckline stays put and the sleeves don't slide down. I am 5'1" and while the dress is long it's not too long.  I wore flat shoes with it and I was not stepping on it.  I really love this dress and would definitely recommend it.
I absolutely love this dress, super cute and flowyy! Very nice fabric up close you can see the detail. Deep V line and perfect for summer! I’m just in awe with this dress

The back is deep cut like the front, and the sleeves sort of drape over the back of the arms.  I am not a small woman, so I was concerned.  However, it is stitched up the shoulder enough that it drapes with little issue.  I also put the dress on over a sort of modest type shirt or a sports bra, and the plummeting neckline was no issue.  I can still have a bit of "chest" without my whole boobs hanging out.The fabric is thick and quite nice, and the color is fantastic.  I am so glad I snagged this dress and can't wait to wear it!  It flatters my body and actually really does make me feel quite cute!
This dress is really pretty and comfortable. Material is nice and soft as well . Perfect baby shower and all the spring summer events!

Cute dress! This dress is not lined. The fabric is lightweight and airy. I like the deep “v” neckline…it gives sexy, which is perfect for date night or a nice meal out. I am wearing a push up bra. This dress stops around my ankles.

This dress is comfortable to wear- however- it's just not flattering at all. The waist is low and hits awkwardly. The neckline is quite low, and the sleeves don't hang right either...it's just a weirdly put together dress.
Poor quality and material was see through and cheap/uncomfortable. Would not purchase again from this seller.
